hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #spider in the wasteland# holds #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path of #gold#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #the Bottom of the Well# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Deku Stick# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Fire Arrows#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Prelude of Light#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #1# major item.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Ice Cavern#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Dodongo's Cavern# is a foolish choice.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Arrows (30 pieces)# can be found in #Goron City#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Bow# and #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that beating Bongo Bongo quickly requires an even tempo.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Fire Arrows#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Prelude of Light#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #Farore's Wind#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ Megaton Hammer Chest

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #a Goron Tunic# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #4# major items.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path of #gold#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a #generic grotto#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Dodongo's Cavern#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the true reward is the friends we made along the way.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that racing #Damp's ghost# rewards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Dodongo's Cavern Compass#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.
